name: Facebook Plus
description:
This style is an extension of user 41465's 
style 25094. (Yes, that means it's required too.)

I began editing it, making my own additions, and it eventually branched into this alternate form. 
As always, comments, suggestions, and complaints are welcome!

I couldn't have created it without Code.Red's hard work on the original.
additional_info:
—————————————— Updates: ——————————————
8/21/2010 - added a couple of ID / class elements for the "Facebook Connect" widget. 
(Even on external sites, the CSS elements can be styled, because it is loaded from Facebook's server.) 
10/23/2010 - Stripped out duplicate code that would need to be updated separately from style 25094. 
Because of this, you now need to install that userstyle to make Facebook Plus complete.
10/29/2010 - I had to change all instances of ".white_box" to ".uiBoxWhite", etc., among other edits.
11/09/2010 - Stupid jewel boxes wouldn't stay put – until I added margin settings.
1/03/2011 - Included more selectors. Added mod for Fb chat dock.
2/17/2011 - Chat dock will compress to the right width when you set yourself to "Offline".
3/11/2011 - I can't wait until border-radius becomes standard, so I no longer need to specify it 3 separate ways.
7/01/2011 - added several changes to keep up with Facebook's tendency to rename classes and IDs; decided -webkit-border-radius and border-radius were now redundant.
9/28/2011 - Much-needed update.
11/07/2011 - Why do they keep changing the names of their CSS classes? I don't even want to go through and remove all the old versions of the class names.
